name: Oh My Blob!
description:
Oh My Blob! is a university group project from University of Northampton. The game supports up to 8 players and is cross-platform between iOS and Android.

Jay paris - Programming, UI, Design, QA, Co-Project lead
Jordan Tomkins - Lead Design, Whiteboxing, QA, Co-Project Lead
Nick Scarlat - Environment Art, Concept Art
Tyree Okakpu Sealey - Prop Art, Concept Art
Brandon Lewis - Environment Art, VFX
George Jagger - Additional UI
Harry - Sound
